history.proof: intros a b c H. apply Zgcd_1_rel_prime. qauto use: Z.divide_factor_l, Zgcd_1_rel_prime, rel_prime_div.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c : Z H : Z.gcd (a * b) c = 1 Unable to unify "Zis_gcd ?M1853 ?M1852 1" with "Z.gcd a c = 1".

In environment a, b, c : Z H : Z.gcd (a * b) c = 1 Unable to unify "Bezout ?M1852 ?M1853 1" with "Z.gcd a c = 1".
In environment a, b, c : Z H : Z.gcd (a * b) c = 1 Unable to unify "Zis_gcd ?M1852 ?M1853 1" with "Z.gcd a c = 1".

exceptions.tactic: apply rel_prime_le_prime with (p := Z.gcd a b).

original: intros a b c H. apply Zgcd_1_rel_prime. apply Zgcd_1_rel_prime in H. apply rel_prime_sym. apply Zdivide_intro with (q := c). apply Znumtheory.rel_prime_sym. apply rel_prime_bezout. apply bezout_rel_prime. apply rel_prime_le_prime with (p := Z.gcd a b). apply prime_gcd. split. apply Z.divide_pos_le. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Zis_gcd_rel_prime. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Z.gcd_nonneg. apply Zgcd_is_gcd.
